description: Tall, redheaded Jack Vidra is having a hard time dealing with his breakup. His ex, sexy muscular Max Konnor, just wanted to focus on work, and could not deal with a relationship. He never did tell ripped Jack what he does, but Jack found out when his friend set him up on a date with an escort. He was shocked to find out that Max is an escort, but at that moment, he didn’t care because he just wanted to feel Max’s massive black cock one last time.
title: Romance For The Night
